body_text: I added these mocks because they make sure that observers get properly cleaned up. We don't strictly need them on every test, but they make the tests more consistent.
body: I added these mocks because they make sure that observers get properly cleaned up. We don't strictly need them on every test, but they make the tests more consistent.
